item.title: Netflix just posted a monster earnings report. What Wall Street analysts are saying

item.title: Wednesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: Stocks jumped on Tuesday, with the Dow surging more than 500 points. Here's what CNBC is watching going into Wednesday.

item.title: BMO says these dividend growth stocks are poised for outperformance
item.description: Dividend growth stocks are a good way to both protect portfolios during times of volatility and boost performance, according to BMO.
